title: Is consciousness one of the greatest threats in the entire universe to everything imaginable? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, it’s UNconsciousness that shuts down the imagination. Consciousness is the only place we know of where the imagination exists. You are thinking too hard, which could leave your universe in tatters, but your imagination will still be ok.
What would it even mean to be a threat to things I checked rent concious? A rock doesn't care what shape it is. A star doesn't cs r if it's burning. You need conciousness to be threatened.
